name: Eurasia
startIntroPart1: We saw how everything that was dear to us perished. We saw how our old government was unable to change what had brought us to our current situation. We were in despair.
startIntroPart2: Our people lost because of their sense of their own exceptionalism. However, we learn from our mistakes. It is time to correct the mistakes of the past and prove to the remnants of this destroyed world that the Eurasian Dream is real!
declaringWar: I officially declare that you have proven the inconsistency of your existence.
attacked: You are just another test we have to go through.
defeated: Is our dream just an illusion?
introduction: I, the embodiment of the will of the peoples of Eurasia, listen to you attentively.
denounced: You are standing in our way, this will end badly for you.
declaringFriendship: Eurasia is with you, my friend.
afterPeace: Perhaps it was just a misunderstanding?
uniques: [-15]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
